rules.justification: Analyzer exceptions should be an error as they can prevent other rules from being validated properly
ID range is not mandatory for modules.
Translation file is not mandatory for modules.
Explicitly defining the DataClassification property is not mandatory for modules.
Object Id's should not be in the free range.
Field Id's should not be in the free range.
Currently permissions in System are created as part of demodata.
Modules can choose a target.
System modules are allowed to access encryption.
InternalsVisibleTo can be used by modules because we do not allow publishing PTEs with Microsoft as publisher in SaaS.
Entitlements may be defined in 1st party applications or extensions.
This warning is not relevant in 1st party applications or extensions.
This error is not relevant in 1st party applications or extensions.

[Logged bug to owner] We should fix this. Actions should use the Image property.
We do know that: Pages and reports should use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable.
Suffixing variable and parameter names with type or object name clouds readability
Obsoleted objects should not be referred to.
Property cannot be customized.
Member cannot be declared as protected.
Argument should be a valid field type.
Prevent duplicate cue actions.
Some names like Promoted are reserved for future AL language features.
Modules are not shipped individually. It is fine if their manifest does not have all the properties set.
Modules are not shipped individually. It is fine if their manifest does not have all the properties set.
Modules are allowed to use OnPrem target.
Name affixes is not mandatory for modules
Modules are allowed to access all tables.
Unsafe methods are allowed in modules
Subscription to OnCompanyOpen event is allowed in modules
ApplicationArea is not enforced.
The ObsoleteTag property and the Tag in the Obsolete attribute must be set to the next release version (Major.Minor).
Obsolete validation is reported as error as part of Ever Green.
Obsolete validation is reported as error as part of Ever Green.
Obsolete validation is reported as error as part of Ever Green.
Obsolete validation is reported as error as part of Ever Green.
Adding a var parameter is a runtime breaking change. It is allowed in master and major branches because apps are recompiled on upgrade to new majors/minors.
Removing a var parameter is a runtime breaking change. It is allowed in master and major branches because apps are recompiled on upgrade to new majors/minors.
InternalsVisibleTo can be used by modules because we do not allow publishing PTEs with Microsoft as publisher in SaaS.
ISV range is not specified for 1st party applications
The 'application' dependency is not mandatory for all 1st party applications.
Increasing the length of fields is not allowed for 1st party extensions.
1st party extensions are not required to use 'ApplicationInsightsKey' for telemetry.
Entitlements may be defined in 1st party applications or extensions.
This warning is not relevant in 1st party applications or extensions.
1st party extensions are not required to use 'Application' to define dependencies.
Adding a return type to a procedure is a runtime breaking change. It is allowed in master and major branches because apps are recompiled on upgrade to new majors/minors.
This warning is not relevant in 1st party applications or extensions.
This error is not relevant in 1st party applications or extensions.
